ygData.subject: Re: Crit hits
ygData.msgSnippet: Only a few problems with crit hits on monks.... 1) Monks hit duel wield and dual attack much more often then other classes. 2) We aren t really supposed to be
ygData.messageBody:
Only a few problems with crit hits on monks....

1) Monks hit duel wield and dual attack much more often then other classes.
2) We aren't really supposed to be the guys that hit for much higher then 40
points per punch anyways.

Only thing i see a problem with is...

1) Pets getting gay settings (i.e. -- lvl 49 necro pets with a FS dagger
with 19 delay hits for higher then a monk, and now much quicker)

2) How does wearing something make you hit faster, monks should without a
doubt get quicker punches, not higher dmg punches quicker punches..

3 We need quicker punches : )


Broy
